name: Life for Gold
description:
Created for April Fools' Day Jam! In 7 days.

The Kobold fell into the clutches of an enemy tribe. He was thrown into a dungeon and will be kept here until a ransom of 100 gold bars is paid for him. This is an incredible amount that no one will be able to pay. We'll have to put up with eternal imprisonment. Or not?

  • Large sandbox
  • Lots of recipes
  • Resource miners
  • Automatic production
  • 100 gold bars for a life!

Control:

  • ALT   - amount of resources
  • CTRL  - transfer 1 resource
  • SHIFT - transfer 10 resources
  • LMB  - transfer of ALL resources
  • RMB  - transfer resources in cell
